member.summary: The content in Card holds texts, images, links and all possible HTML elements.

tr.td: Defines the Orientation of the card, They are,
Vertical - Top to Bottom alignment of the card component.
Horizontal - Right to Left alignment of the card component.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.CardOrientation.Vertical
member.summary: Vertical - Top to Bottom alignment of the card component.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.CardOrientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Horizontal - Right to Left alignment of the card component.

tr.td: Defines the Title position of title in the Card Image, They are,
BottomLeft - Title position BottomLeft of card Image.
BottomRight - Title position BottomRight of card Image.
TopLeft - Title position TopLeft of card Image.
TopRight - Title position TopRight of card Image.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.TitlePositions.BottomLeft
member.summary: BottomLeft - Title position BottomLeft of card Image.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.TitlePositions.BottomRight
member.summary: BottomRight - Title position BottomRight of card Image.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.TitlePositions.TopLeft
member.summary: TopLeft - Title position TopLeft of card Image.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.TitlePositions.TopRight
member.summary: TopRight - Title position TopRight of card Image.

tr.td: Defines the image position in the Card Header. They are,
Left - Image position in the left of card header
Right - Image position in the right of card header

member.summary: Left - Image position in the left of card header

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Blazor.Cards.ImagePosition.Right
